__e: Harper, you don't even know what you've got, do you?
Harper, you have no idea what this could do to you!
harper, you have to believe, or else what do you have?
Hey, wha... what's Harper doing here?
No, no, see, that- That's harper's doing.
I know harper is wrong, but I don't know why he's wrong.
Now Harper and I just have to find a way to kill it.
Why did you say your name was Harper?
I don't have any patients named Harper, and you didn't come here to talk about that.
Boy, this is an Alan Harper I haven't seen before.
All right, that's good, Harper, that's good.
You tell Harper the time he's got is the time it takes me to get from here to his machine shop.
I feel like half a person, like without Harper I don't know what my life is anymore.
Okay, look, Mr. Harper has nothing to do with this.
You said Harper, it's the culprit, not these people?
Mr. Harper is my new boss. Boss?
It's not Harper's body, it's mine!
